flavor_text:
While it is young,
it uses the
nutrients that are stored in the
seeds on its back
in order to grow.
name: bulbasaur

flavor_text:
The bulb on its
back grows as it
absorbs nutrients. The bulb gives off
a pleasant aroma
when it blooms.
name: ivysaur

flavor_text:
As it warms it­
self and absorbs
the sunlight, its flower petals
release a pleasant
fragrance.
name: venusaur

flavor_text:
If it's healthy,
the flame on the
tip of its tail will burn vigor­
ously, even if it
gets a bit wet.
name: charmander

flavor_text:
If it becomes
agitated during
battle, it spouts intense flames,
incinerating its
surroundings.
name: charmeleon

flavor_text:
It uses its wings
to fly high. The
temperature of its fire increases as
it gains exper­
ience in battle.
name: charizard

flavor_text:
When it feels
threatened, it
draws its legs inside its shell
and sprays water
from its mouth.
name: squirtle

flavor_text:
Its long, furry
tail is a symbol
of longevity, making it quite
popular among
older people.
name: wartortle

flavor_text:
It firmly plants
its feet on the
ground before shooting water
from the jets on
its back.
name: blastoise

flavor_text:
It crawls into
foliage where it
camouflages itself among leaves that
are the same color
as its body.
name: caterpie

flavor_text:
This is its pre-
evolved form. At
this stage, it can only harden, so it
remains motionless
to avoid attack.
name: metapod

flavor_text:
It flits from
flower to flower,
collecting honey. It can even
identify distant
flowers in bloom.
name: butterfree

flavor_text:
The barb on top of
its head secretes
a strong poison. It uses this toxic
barb to protect
itself.
name: weedle

flavor_text:
Nearly incapable
of movement, it
leans against stout trees while
waiting for its
evolution.
name: kakuna

flavor_text:
It uses sharp,
poisonous stings
to defeat prey, then takes the
victim back to its
nest for food.
name: beedrill

flavor_text:
It rapidly flaps
its wings in the
grass, stirring up a dust cloud that
drives insect prey
out into the open.
name: pidgey

flavor_text:
It slowly flies in
a circular pat­
tern, all the while keeping a
sharp lookout for
prey.
name: pidgeotto

flavor_text:
Its outstanding
vision allows it
to spot splashing MAGIKARP, even
while flying at
3300 feet.
name: pidgeot

flavor_text:
This POKéMON's
impressive vital­
ity allows it to live anywhere. It
also multiplies
very quickly.
name: rattata

flavor_text:
The webs on its
hind legs enable
it to cross rivers. It search­
es wide areas for
food.
name: raticate

flavor_text:
To protect its
territory, it
flies around ceaselessly,
making high-
pitched cries.
name: spearow

flavor_text:
It uses its long
beak to attack. It
has a surprisingly long reach, so it
must be treated
with caution.
name: fearow

flavor_text:
It flutters the
tip of its tongue
to seek out the scent of prey,
then swallows the
prey whole.
name: ekans

flavor_text:
To intimidate
foes, it spreads
its chest wide and makes eerie sounds
by expelling air
from its mouth.
name: arbok

flavor_text:
When it is anger­
ed, it immediately
discharges the energy stored in
the pouches in its
cheeks.
name: pikachu

flavor_text:
If its electric
pouches run empty,
it raises its tail to gather electri­
city from the
atmosphere.
name: raichu

flavor_text:
It prefers dry,
sandy places
because it uses the sand to
protect itself
when threatened.
name: sandshrew

flavor_text:
Adept at climbing
trees, it rolls
into a spiny ball, then attacks its
enemies from
above.
name: sandslash

flavor_text:
Small and very
docile, it pro­
tects itself with its small, poison­
ous horn when
attacked.
name: nidoran-f

flavor_text:
It has a docile
nature. If it is
threatened with attack, it raises
the barbs that are
all over its body.
name: nidorina

flavor_text:
The hard scales
that cover its
strong body serve as excellent
protection from
any attack.
name: nidoqueen

flavor_text:
It constantly
moves its large
ears in many directions in
order to detect
danger right away.
name: nidoran-m

flavor_text:
It is easily
agitated and uses
its horn for offense as soon as
it notices an
attacker.
name: nidorino

flavor_text:
It uses its thick
arms, legs and
tail to attack forcefully. Melee
combat is its
specialty.
name: nidoking

flavor_text:
Though rarely
seen, it becomes
easier to spot, for some reason,
on the night of a 
full moon.
name: clefairy

flavor_text:
Said to live in
quiet, remote
mountains, this type of fairy has
a strong aversion
to being seen.
name: clefable

flavor_text:
As its body grows
larger, its six
warm tails become more beautiful,
with a more luxur­
ious coat of fur.
name: vulpix

flavor_text:
It is said to live
a thousand years,
and each of its tails is loaded
with supernatural
powers.
name: ninetales

flavor_text:
It rolls its cute
eyes as it sings a
soothing lullaby. Its gentle song
puts anyone who
hears it to sleep.
name: jigglypuff

flavor_text:
The rich, fluffy
fur that covers
its body feels so good that anyone
who feels it can't
stop touching it.
name: wigglytuff

flavor_text:
During the day, it
gathers with
others and hangs from the ceilings
of old buildings
and caves.
name: zubat

flavor_text:
When it plunges
its fangs into its
prey, it instantly draws and gulps
down more than ten
ounces of blood.
name: golbat

flavor_text:
During the day, it
stays in the cold
underground to avoid the sun.
It grows by bath­
ing in moonlight.
name: oddish

flavor_text:
The smell from its
drool-like syrup
and the pollen on its petals is so
bad, it may make
opponents faint.
name: gloom

flavor_text:
By shaking its big
petals, it scat­
ters toxic pollen into the air,
turning the air
yellow.
name: vileplume

flavor_text:
The tochukaso
growing on this
POKéMON's back orders it to
extract juice from
tree trunks.
name: paras

flavor_text:
When nothing's
left to extract
from the bug, the mushrooms on its
back leave spores
on the bug's egg.
name: parasect

flavor_text:
The small bugs it
eats appear only
at night, so it sleeps in a hole
in a tree until
night falls.
name: venonat

flavor_text:
The scales it
scatters will
paralyze anyone who touches them,
making that person
unable to stand.
name: venomoth

flavor_text:
It digs under­
ground and chews
on tree roots, sticking its head
out only when the
sun isn't bright.
name: diglett

flavor_text:
These DIGLETT
triplets dig over
60 miles below sea level. No one
knows what it's
like underground.
name: dugtrio

flavor_text:
It loves things
that sparkle. When
it sees a shiny object, the gold
coin on its head
shines too.
name: meowth

flavor_text:
Behind its lithe,
elegant appearance
lies a barbaric side. It will tear
apart its prey on
a mere whim.
name: persian

flavor_text:
The only time it
can use its psy­
chic power is when its sleeping brain
cells happen to
wake.
name: psyduck

flavor_text:
It swims grace­
fully along on the
quiet, slow-moving rivers and lakes
of which it is so
fond.
name: golduck

flavor_text:
It lives in groups
in the treetops.
If it loses sight of its group, it
becomes infuriated
by its loneliness.
name: mankey

flavor_text:
It will beat up
anyone who makes
it mad, even if it has to chase them
until the end of
the world.
name: primeape

flavor_text:
It controls a big
territory. If it
detects an unknown smell, it roars
loudly to force
out the intruder.
name: growlithe

flavor_text:
An ancient picture
scroll shows that
people were attracted to its
movement as it ran
through prairies.
name: arcanine

flavor_text:
The swirl on its
belly is its
insides showing through the skin.
It looks clearer
after it eats.
name: poliwag

flavor_text:
Though it is
skilled at walk­
ing, it prefers to live underwater
where there is
less danger.
name: poliwhirl

flavor_text:
It can use its
well-developed
arms and legs to run on the surface
of the water for a
split second.
name: poliwrath

flavor_text:
It hypnotizes
itself so that it
can teleport away when it senses
danger, even
if it is asleep.
name: abra

flavor_text:
When it closes its
eyes, twice as
many alpha parti­ cles come out of
the surface of its
body.
name: kadabra

flavor_text:
It has an IQ of
5000. It calcu­
lates many things in order to gain
the edge in every
battle.
name: alakazam

flavor_text:
It trains by
lifting rocks in
the mountains. It can even pick up a
GRAVELER with
ease.
name: machop

flavor_text:
This tough POKéMON
always stays in
the zone. Its muscles become
thicker after
every battle.
name: machoke

flavor_text:
With four arms
that react more
quickly than it can think, it can
execute many
punches at once.
name: machamp

flavor_text:
If it notices
anything that
moves, it immediately flings
its vine at the
object.
name: bellsprout

flavor_text:
When it's hungry,
it swings its
razor-sharp leaves, slicing up
any unlucky object
nearby for food.
name: weepinbell

flavor_text:
Once ingested into
this POKéMON's
body, even the hardest object
will melt into
nothing.
name: victreebel

flavor_text:
As it floats along
on the waves, it
uses its toxic feelers to stab
anything it
touches.
name: tentacool

flavor_text:
When its 80 feel­
ers absorb water,
it stretches to become like a net
to entangle its
prey.
name: tentacruel

flavor_text:
Proud of their
sturdy bodies,
they bash against each other in a
contest to prove
whose is harder.
name: geodude

flavor_text:
It travels by rol­
ling on mountain
paths. If it gains too much speed, it
stops by running
into huge rocks.
name: graveler

flavor_text:
Its rock-like body
is so durable,
even high-powered dynamite blasts
fail to scratch
its rugged hide.
name: golem

flavor_text:
Training by
jumping over grass
that grows longer every day has made
it a world-class
jumper.
name: ponyta

flavor_text:
It just loves to
gallop. The faster
it goes, the long­ er the swaying
flames of its mane
will become.
name: rapidash

flavor_text:
It is always so
absent-minded that
it won't react, even if its
flavorful tail is
bitten.
name: slowpoke

flavor_text:
An attached
SHELLDER won't let
go because of the tasty flavor that
oozes out of its
tail.
name: slowbro

flavor_text:
The electricity
emitted by the
units on each side of its body cause
it to become a
strong magnet.
name: magnemite

flavor_text:
When many
MAGNETON gather
together, the resulting magnetic
storm disrupts
radio waves.
name: magneton

flavor_text:
In order to pre­
vent their
extinction, more people have made
an effort to breed
these POKéMON.
name: farfetchd

flavor_text:
It lives on a
grassy plain where
it can see a long way. If it sees an
enemy, it runs
away at 60 mph.
name: doduo

flavor_text:
An enemy that
takes its eyes off
any of the three heads--even for a
second--will get
pecked severely.
name: dodrio

flavor_text:
The light blue fur
that covers it
keeps it protected against the cold.
It loves iceberg-
filled oceans.
name: seel

flavor_text:
It sleeps under
shallow ocean
waters during the day, then looks
for food at night
when it's cold.
name: dewgong

flavor_text:
When two of these
POKéMON's bodies
are combined together, new
poisons are
created.
name: grimer

flavor_text:
As it moves, a
very strong poison
leaks from it, making the ground
there barren for
three years.
name: muk

flavor_text:
Clamping on to an
opponent reveals
its vulnerable parts, so it uses
this move only as
a last resort.
name: shellder

flavor_text:
Even a missile
can't break the
spikes it uses to stab opponents.
They're even hard­
er than its shell.
name: cloyster

flavor_text:
It wraps its op­
ponent in its gas-
like body, slowly weakening its prey
by poisoning it
through the skin.
name: gastly

flavor_text:
It hides in the
dark, planning to
take the life of the next living
thing that wanders
close by.
name: haunter

flavor_text:
Hiding in people's
shadows at night,
it absorbs their heat. The chill it
causes makes the
victims shake.
name: gengar

flavor_text:
As it digs through
the ground, it
absorbs many hard objects. This is
what makes its
body so solid.
name: onix

flavor_text:
When it twitches
its nose, it can
tell where someone is sleeping and
what that person
is dreaming about.
name: drowzee

flavor_text:
The longer it
swings its
pendulum, the longer the effects
of its hypnosis
last.
name: hypno

flavor_text:
If it is unable
to find food, it
will absorb nutrients by
swallowing a
mouthful of sand.
name: krabby

flavor_text:
Its oversized claw
is very powerful,
but when it's not in battle, the
claw just gets in
the way.
name: kingler

flavor_text:
During the study
of this POKéMON,
it was discovered that its compo­
nents are not
found in nature.
name: voltorb

flavor_text:
The more energy it
charges up, the
faster it gets. But this also
makes it more
likely to explode.
name: electrode

flavor_text:
If even one is
separated from the
group, the energy bond between the
six will make them
rejoin instantly.
name: exeggcute

flavor_text:
Living in a good
environment makes
it grow lots of heads. A head that
drops off becomes
an EXEGGCUTE.
name: exeggutor

flavor_text:
It lost its mother
after its birth.
It wears its mother's skull,
never revealing
its true face.
name: cubone

flavor_text:
Somewhere in the
world is a ceme­
tery just for MAROWAK. It gets
its bones from
those graves.
name: marowak

flavor_text:
It is also called
the Kick Master.
It uses its elastic legs to
execute every
known kick.
name: hitmonlee

flavor_text:
To increase the
strength of all
its punch moves, it spins its arms
just before making
contact.
name: hitmonchan

flavor_text:
It has a tongue
that is over 6’6’’
long. It uses this long tongue to
lick its body
clean.
name: lickitung

flavor_text:
If one gets close
enough to it when
it expels poison­ ous gas, the gas
swirling inside it
can be seen.
name: koffing

flavor_text:
When it inhales
poisonous gases
from garbage, its body expands, and
its insides smell
much worse.
name: weezing

flavor_text:
It can remember
only one thing at
a time. Once it starts rushing, it
forgets why it
started.
name: rhyhorn

flavor_text:
By lightly spin­
ning its drill-
like horn, it can easily shatter
even a diamond in
the rough.
name: rhydon

flavor_text:
People try to
catch it for its
extremely nutritious eggs,
but it rarely can
be found.
name: chansey

flavor_text:
During battle, it
constantly moves
the vines that cover its body in
order to annoy its
opponent.
name: tangela

flavor_text:
To avoid
crushing the
baby it carries in its pouch, it
always sleeps
standing up.
name: kangaskhan

flavor_text:
When they're in a
safe location,
they can be seen playfully tangling
their tails
together.
name: horsea

flavor_text:
The male raises
the young. If it
is approached, it uses its toxic
spikes to fend off
the intruder.
name: seadra

flavor_text:
During spawning
season, they swim
gracefully in the water, searching
for their perfect
mate.
name: goldeen

flavor_text:
When autumn comes,
the males patrol
the area around their nests in
order to protect
their offspring.
name: seaking

flavor_text:
When the stars
twinkle at night,
it floats up from the sea floor, and
its body's center
core flickers.
name: staryu

flavor_text:
It is said that it
uses the seven-
colored core of its body to send
electric waves
into outer space.
name: starmie

flavor_text:
It uses the
mysterious
power it has in its fingers to
solidify air into
an invisible wall.
name: mr-mime

flavor_text:
It's very proud of
its speed. It
moves so fast that its opponent does
not even know what
knocked it down.
name: scyther

flavor_text:
It has several
different cry pat­
terns, each of which seems to
have its own
meaning.
name: jynx

flavor_text:
When two
ELECTABUZZ touch,
they control the electric currents
to communicate
their feelings.
name: electabuzz

flavor_text:
It moves more
frequently in hot
areas. It can heal itself by dipping
its wound into
lava.
name: magmar

flavor_text:
When the tempera­
ture drops at
night, it sleeps on treetops or
among roots where
it is well hidden.
name: pinsir

flavor_text:
These violent
POKéMON fight
with other mem­ bers of their herd
in order to prove
their strength.
name: tauros

flavor_text:
This weak and
pathetic POKéMON
gets easily pushed along rivers when
there are strong
currents.
name: magikarp

flavor_text:
It appears when­
ever there is
world conflict, burning down any
place it travels
through.
name: gyarados

flavor_text:
This gentle
POKéMON loves to
give people rides and provides a ve­
ry comfortable way
to get around.
name: lapras

flavor_text:
When it encount­
ers another DITTO,
it will move faster than normal
to duplicate that
opponent exactly.
name: ditto

flavor_text:
Its ability to
evolve into many
forms allows it to adapt smoothly
and perfectly to
any environment.
name: eevee

flavor_text:
As it uses the
fins on the tip
of its tail to swim, it blends
with the water
perfectly.
name: vaporeon

flavor_text:
The negatively
charged ions
generated in its fur create a
constant sparking
noise.
name: jolteon

flavor_text:
Once it has stored
up enough heat,
this POKéMON's body temperature
can reach up to
1700 degrees.
name: flareon

flavor_text:
An artificial
POKéMON created
due to extensive research, it can
perform only what
is in its program.
name: porygon

flavor_text:
In prehistoric
times, it swam on
the sea floor, eating plankton.
Its fossils are
sometimes found.
name: omanyte

flavor_text:
Its heavy shell
allowed it to
reach only nearby food. This could
be the reason it
is extinct.
name: omastar

flavor_text:
Three hundred
million years ago,
it hid on the sea floor. It also has
eyes on its back
that glow.
name: kabuto

flavor_text:
It was able to
swim quickly thro­
ugh the water by compactly folding
up its razor-sharp
sickles.
name: kabutops

flavor_text:
In prehistoric
times, this
POKéMON flew freely and
fearlessly through
the skies.
name: aerodactyl

flavor_text:
This POKéMON's
stomach is so
strong, even eating moldy or
rotten food will
not affect it.
name: snorlax

flavor_text:
Legendary bird
POKéMON. As it
flies through the sky, it cools the
air, causing snow
to fall.
name: articuno

flavor_text:
Legendary bird
POKéMON. They say
lightning caused by the flapping of
its wings causes
summer storms.
name: zapdos

flavor_text:
Legendary bird
POKéMON. It is
said to migrate from the south
along with the
spring.
name: moltres

flavor_text:
It sheds many lay­
ers of skin as it
grows larger. Dur­ ing this process,
it is protected by
a rapid waterfall.
name: dratini

flavor_text:
It is called the
divine POKéMON.
When its entire body brightens
slightly, the
weather changes.
name: dragonair

flavor_text:
It is said that
somewhere in the
ocean lies an island where these
gather. Only they
live there.
name: dragonite

flavor_text:
Said to rest qui­
etly in an
undiscovered cave, this POKéMON was
created solely for
battling.
name: mewtwo

flavor_text:
Because it can
learn any move,
some people began research to see if
it is the ancestor
of all POKéMON.
name: mew

flavor_text:
It loves to bask
in the sunlight.
It uses the leaf on its head to
seek out warm
places.
name: chikorita

flavor_text:
The scent that
wafts from the
leaves on its neck causes anyone who
smells it to
become energetic.
name: bayleef

flavor_text:
Anyone who stands
beside it becomes
refreshed, just as if they were
relaxing in a
sunny forest.
name: meganium

flavor_text:
The fire that
spouts from its
back burns hottest when it is angry.
The flaring flames
intimidate foes.
name: cyndaquil

flavor_text:
Before battle, it
turns its back on
its opponent to demonstrate how
ferociously its
fire blazes.
name: quilava

flavor_text:
When heat from its
body causes the
air around it to shimmer, this is a
sign that it is
ready to battle.
name: typhlosion

flavor_text:
This rough critter
chomps at any
moving object it sees. Turning your
back on it is not
recommended.
name: totodile

flavor_text:
The tips of its
fangs are slanted
backward. Once those fangs clamp
down, the prey has
no hope of escape.
name: croconaw

flavor_text:
Although it has a
massive body, its
powerful hind legs enable it to move
quickly, even on
the ground.
name: feraligatr

flavor_text:
When acting as a
lookout, it warns
others of danger by screeching and
hitting the ground
with its tail.
name: sentret

flavor_text:
It lives in narrow
burrows that fit
its slim body. The deeper the nests
go, the more maze­
like they become.
name: furret

flavor_text:
It begins to hoot
at the same time
every day. Some trainers use them
in place of
clocks.
name: hoothoot

flavor_text:
Its extremely soft
feathers make no
sound in flight. It silently sneaks
up on prey without
being detected.
name: noctowl

flavor_text:
It is timid and
clusters together
with others. The fluid secreted by
its feet indicates
its location.
name: ledyba

flavor_text:
In the daytime
when it gets warm,
it curls up inside a big leaf and
drifts off into
a deep slumber.
name: ledian

flavor_text:
If prey becomes
ensnared in its
nest of spun string, it waits
motionlessly until
it becomes dark.
name: spinarak

flavor_text:
Rather than mak­
ing a nest in one
specific spot, it wanders in search
of food after
darkness falls.
name: ariados

flavor_text:
As a result of its
pursuit of faster,
yet more silent flight, a new set
of wings grew on
its hind legs.
name: crobat

flavor_text:
Its antennae, whi­
ch evolved from a
fin, have both po­ sitive and neg­
ative charges flo­
wing through them.
name: chinchou

flavor_text:
This POKéMON uses
the bright part of
its body, which changed from a
dorsal fin, to
lure prey.
name: lanturn

flavor_text:
It is unskilled at
storing electric
power. Any kind of shock causes it to
discharge energy
spontaneously.
name: pichu

flavor_text:
If the impact site
of a meteorite is
found, this POKéMON is certain
to be within the
immediate area.
name: cleffa

flavor_text:
Instead of walking
with its short
legs, it moves around by bouncing
on its soft,
tender body.
name: igglybuff

flavor_text:
It is considered
to be a symbol of
good luck. Its shell is said to
be filled with
happiness.
name: togepi

flavor_text:
Although it does
not flap its wings
very much, it can stay up in the air
as it tags along
after its trainer.
name: togetic

flavor_text:
It is extremely
good at climbing
tree trunks and likes to eat the
new sprouts on
the trees.
name: natu

flavor_text:
Once it begins to
meditate at sun­
rise, the entire day will pass
before it will
move again.
name: xatu

flavor_text:
It stores lots of
air in its soft
fur, allowing it to stay cool in
summer and warm
in winter.
name: mareep

flavor_text:
Because of its
rubbery, electric­
ity-resistant skin, it can store
lots of electric­
ity in its fur.
name: flaaffy

flavor_text:
When it gets dark,
the light from its
bright, shiny tail can be seen from
far away on the
ocean's surface.
name: ampharos

flavor_text:
When these dance
together, their
petals rub against each other,
making pretty,
relaxing sounds.
name: bellossom

flavor_text:
The fur on its
body naturally
repels water. It can stay dry, even
when it plays in
the water.
name: marill

flavor_text:
The bubble-like
pattern on its
stomach helps it camouflage itself
when it's in the
water.
name: azumarill

flavor_text:
If a tree branch
shakes when there
is no wind, it's a SUDOWOODO, not a
tree. It hides
from the rain.
name: sudowoodo

flavor_text:
When it expands
its throat to
croak out a tune, nearby POLIWAG and
POLIWHIRL gather
immediately.
name: politoed

flavor_text:
It can be carried
away on even the
gentlest breeze. It may even float
all the way to the
next town.
name: hoppip

flavor_text:
As soon as it
rains, it closes
its flower and hides in the shade
of a tree to avoid
getting wet.
name: skiploom

flavor_text:
Even in the fierc­
est wind, it can
control its fluff to make its way to
any place in the
world it wants.
name: jumpluff

flavor_text:
It uses its tail
to hang on to tree
branches. It uses its momentum to
swing from one
branch to another.
name: aipom

flavor_text:
It is very weak.
Its only means of
defense is to shake its leaves
desperately at its
attacker.
name: sunkern

flavor_text:
As the hot season
approaches, the
petals on this POKéMON's face
become more vivid
and lively.
name: sunflora

flavor_text:
It can see in all
directions without
moving its big eyes, helping it
spot attackers and
food right away.
name: yanma

flavor_text:
A mucous
membrane covers
its body. Touching it barehanded will
cause a shooting
pain.
name: wooper

flavor_text:
Its body is always
slimy. It often
bangs its head on the river bottom
as it swims but
seems not to care.
name: quagsire

flavor_text:
The tip of its
forked tail
quivers when it is predicting its
opponent's next
move.
name: espeon

flavor_text:
On the night of a
full moon, or when
it gets excited, the ring patterns
on its body glow
yellow.
name: umbreon

flavor_text:
It hides any shiny
object it finds in
a secret location. MURKROW and
MEOWTH loot one
another's stashes.
name: murkrow

flavor_text:
Every time it ya­
wns, SHELLDER
injects more poi­ son into it. The
poison makes it
more intelligent.
name: slowking

flavor_text:
It loves to watch
people it's scar­
ed. It frightens them by screaming
loudly or appear­
ing suddenly.
name: misdreavus

flavor_text:
Because different
types of UNOWN
exist, it is said that they must
have a variety of
abilities.
name: unown

flavor_text:
In order to con­
ceal its black
tail, it lives in a dark cave and
only moves about
at night.
name: wobbuffet

flavor_text:
When it is in
danger, its tail
uses some sort of mysterious powers
to drive away the
enemy.
name: girafarig

flavor_text:
It spits out a
fluid that it uses
to glue tree bark to its body. The
fluid hardens when
it touches air.
name: pineco

flavor_text:
Usually found
hanging on to a
fat tree trunk. It shoots out bits of
its shell when it
sees action.
name: forretress

flavor_text:
It hides deep
inside caves where
no light ever reaches it and
remains virtually
motionless there.
name: dunsparce

flavor_text:
It builds its nest
on a steep cliff.
When it is done gliding, it hops
along the ground
back to its nest.
name: gligar

flavor_text:
The many small
metal particles
that cover this POKéMON's body
reflect bright
light well.
name: steelix

flavor_text:
In truth, it is a
cowardly POKéMON.
It growls eagerly in order to hide
its fear from its
opponent.
name: snubbull

flavor_text:
It can make most
any POKéMON run
away simply by opening its mouth
wide to reveal its
big fangs.
name: granbull

flavor_text:
When faced with a
larger opponent,
it swallows as much water as it
can to match the
opponent's size.
name: qwilfish

flavor_text:
This POKéMON's
pincers, which
contain steel, can crush any hard
object it gets a
hold of into bits.
name: scizor

flavor_text:
The fluid secreted
by its toes carves
holes in rocks for nesting and can be
mixed with BERRIES
to make a drink.
name: shuckle

flavor_text:
With its Herculean
powers, it can
easily throw arou­ nd an object that
is 100 times its
own weight.
name: heracross

flavor_text:
This cunning
POKéMON hides
under the cover of darkness,
waiting to attack
its prey.
name: sneasel

flavor_text:
It always licks
honey. Its palm
tastes sweet because of all the
honey it has
absorbed.
name: teddiursa

flavor_text:
Although it has a
large body, it is
quite skilled at climbing trees. It
eats and sleeps in
the treetops.
name: ursaring

flavor_text:
These group to­
gether in areas
that are hotter than normal. If it
cools off, its
skin hardens.
name: slugma

flavor_text:
Its body is as hot
as lava and is
always billowing. Flames will
occasionally burst
from its shell.
name: magcargo

flavor_text:
It uses the tip of
its nose to dig
for food. Its nose is so tough that
even frozen ground
poses no problem.
name: swinub

flavor_text:
Although its legs
are short, its
rugged hooves prevent it from
slipping, even on
icy ground.
name: piloswine

flavor_text:
The points on its
head absorb
nutrients from clean water. They
cannot survive in
polluted water.
name: corsola

flavor_text:
To escape from an
attacker, it may
shoot water out of its mouth, then
use that force to
swim backward.
name: remoraid

flavor_text:
Its instinct is to
bury itself in
holes. It often steals the nesting
holes of others to
sleep in them.
name: octillery

flavor_text:
It always carries
its food with it,
wherever it goes. If attacked, it
throws its food at
the opponent.
name: delibird

flavor_text:
It swims along
freely, eating
things that swim into its mouth.
Its whole body is
very coarse.
name: mantine

flavor_text:
The feathers that
it sheds are very
sharp. It is said that people once
used the feathers
as swords.
name: skarmory

flavor_text:
Around dawn, its
ominous howl
echoes through the area to announce
that this is its
territory.
name: houndour

flavor_text:
The pungent-
smelling flame
that shoots from its mouth results
from toxins burn­
ing in its body.
name: houndoom

flavor_text:
It stores energy
by sleeping at
underwater depths at which no other
life forms can
survive.
name: kingdra

flavor_text:
During the desert­
ed morning hours,
it comes ashore where it deftly
uses its trunk to
take a shower.
name: phanpy

flavor_text:
Because this
POKéMON's skin is
so tough, a normal attack won't even
leave a scratch on
it.
name: donphan

flavor_text:
This manmade
POKéMON evolved
from the latest technology. It
may have unprog­
rammed reactions.
name: porygon2

flavor_text:
The round balls
found on the
fallen antlers can be ground into a
powder that aids
in sleeping.
name: stantler

flavor_text:
The color of the
mysterious fluid
secreted from its tail is predeter­
mined for each
SMEARGLE.
name: smeargle

flavor_text:
To brush up on its
fighting skills,
it will challenge anyone. It has a
very strong com­
petitive spirit.
name: tyrogue

flavor_text:
After doing a
handstand to
throw off the opponent's timing,
it presents its
fancy kick moves.
name: hitmontop

flavor_text:
The sensitivity of
its lips develops
most quickly. It uses them to
try to identify
unknown objects.
name: smoochum

flavor_text:
It loves violent
thunder. The space
between its horns flickers bluish-
white when it is
charging energy.
name: elekid

flavor_text:
It naturally spits
an 1100-degree
flame. It is said when many appear,
it heralds a
volcanic eruption.
name: magby

flavor_text:
In order to milk a
MILTANK, one must
have a knack for rhythmically pull­
ing up and down
on its udders.
name: miltank

flavor_text:
Biting into one
of the delicious
eggs that BLISSEY provides will make
everyone around
smile with joy.
name: blissey

flavor_text:
This rough POKéMON
stores energy
inside its body, then sweeps across
the land, shooting
off electricity.
name: raikou

flavor_text:
This brawny
POKéMON courses
around the earth, spouting flames
hotter than a
volcano's magma.
name: entei

flavor_text:
This divine
POKéMON blows
around the world, always in search
of a pure
reservoir.
name: suicune

flavor_text:
Born deep under­
ground, this
POKéMON becomes a pupa after eating
enough dirt to
make a mountain.
name: larvitar

flavor_text:
It will not stay
still, even while
it's a pupa. It already has arms
and legs under its
solid shell.
name: pupitar

flavor_text:
In just one of its
mighty hands, it
has the power to make the ground
shake and moun­
tains crumble.
name: tyranitar

flavor_text:
It has an incred­
ible ability to
calm raging sto­ rms. It is said
that LUGIA appears
when storms start.
name: lugia

flavor_text:
It will reveal
itself before a
pure-hearted trainer by shining
its bright rain­
bow-colored wings.
name: ho-oh

flavor_text:
Revered as a
guardian of the
forest, CELEBI appears wherever
beautiful forests
exist.
name: celebi
